venue.address_2: Look for Boat Launch sign on left
venue.name: Pawtuckaway Lake Fundy Cove Launch

item.description:
This event is open to all kayak types as well as canoes

We'll launch from Fundy Cove in Nottinham NH at the Fundy Cove Boat Launch located off of Deerfield Rd. This location is prone to fishing boats with trailers so please be courteous when launching if a boat is also launching or exiting.

Click on photo above for view of Fundy Cove Boat Launch Site

Life Vests aka PFDs must be worn when paddling with this group

Directions:

* Take Rt. 101 to Raymond NH
* Take exit 5 for NH-107/NH-102 toward Fremont/Raymond/NH-156
* Turn right at Freetown Rd/Fremont Rd/NH-102/NH-107
* Turn Left at second lights onto NH-107/NH-27/Rte-27 492 ft
* Turn right at NH-156/Nottingham Rd Continue to follow NH-156 5.4 mi
* Turn left onto Deerfield Rd There is a monument at intersection on the right
* Follow Deerfield rd. approx 2 miles look for boat launch sign on left after crossing small bridge.
* Drive narrow road approx. 1 mile to boat launch.

Google Maps directions to Fundy Cove Launch Site off of Deerfield Rd. Nottingham NH
item.name: Pawtuckaway from Fundy Cove Lake Nottingham NH Paddle
